summary: Successfully tested KPI Metrics Enhancement for Sharda Lead Management Dashboard. All 3 new metrics (Avg Lead Age, Avg Closure Time, Conversion Rate) are working correctly on both backend and frontend. Admin can configure conversion rate formula via dropdowns. All requested features are functional.
passed_tests: KPI API returns avg_lead_age field (141.9 days)
KPI API returns avg_closure_time field (1.4 days)
Dashboard displays Avg Lead Age KPI card with days unit
Dashboard displays Avg Closure Time KPI card with days unit
Dashboard displays Conversion Rate KPI card with percentage
Admin Metric Settings page accessible and functional
New metrics show proper type badges (calculated, formula, count)
Conversion Rate formula editor with Numerator/Denominator dropdowns
Metric types correctly assigned (calculated for time metrics, formula for conversion rate)
